item.title: CVE-2023-44248|2024-08-30T18:11:55.384Z -- fortinet -- fortiedr
item.description: An improper access control vulnerability [CWE-284] inÂ FortiEDRCollectorWindows version 5.2.0.4549 and below, 5.0.3.1007 and below, 4.0 all may allow a local attacker to prevent the collector service to start in the next system reboot by tampering with some registry keys of the service.
